alert.note: Alert for Arthur; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northeastern Keith and southwestern McPherson Counties through 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/... At 649 PM CDT/549 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lemoyne, or 14 miles north of Ogallala, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lemoyne, Three Mile Lake, Bucktail Lake and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 97 and 119. Highway 92 between mile markers 130 and 138, and between mile markers 169 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
